Articles.Content: Hinges would be helpful af, im trying to do a droop snoot on my plane but hinges are difficult to make. can u just add a stock part

It would be cool in stock, but while we wait there is this one:
https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/170484-14-dockrotate-lightweight-robotics-rotational-control-on-docking-ports-plus-noderotate-make-any-part-rotate/

Very stable, minimalistic and allows docking ports to rotate around...you can create massive cargo bays, VTOLs, folding rovers, wing retracting planes...
Making stock hinges may be a bit tricky, but there is nothing more satisfying than making a "stock only" craft most people can only make with mods.

Stock hinges are more than possible though. It's tough to design one for a given purpose, and I do sorta wish there was a hinge that didn't result in detaching parts into a separate craft though (although many designs let you re-dock).
